title: Items for Mages!
body:
I'm no smite player, but I always wanted to play it so I watch some smite videos along with league

I noticed they have some interesting magic damage items that can inspire great item concepts for ap item options for Mages (and AP Assassins)

**bancroft's talon**

This seems like a great sustain item for Mages

Granting 100 magic damage, 15% magic lifesteal and 150 mana

And has a Passive that grants you bonus Magic damage and magic life steal scaling with missing health (caps at 100 magic damage and 20% magic lifesteal once you reach 25% of your max HP or Below)

Translating to league and toning it down a bit we can have it along the lines of

80 AP
5% Spell vamp
150 mana

Unique Passive - gain AP and spell vamp scaling with your missing health (caps at 40 AP and 3% spell vamp when at 25% max HP or less)

**shaman's ring**

Interesting item, not sure how to describe

100 magic damage
10% movement speed

It also has a Passive where every time you deal 100 damage to enemy gods(champions) gain a stack, at 50 stacks this item transforms and your abilities now debuff enemy gods(champions) hit making them take 10% increased damage from you for 5 seconds

We could keep the Passive unchanged  but make it unique, as for stats

75 AP
8% MS

Sounds reasonable
